name: Automated Google Calendar event creation via KlickTipp
description:
This template listens for new tags applied to contacts in KlickTipp and automatically creates a corresponding event in Google Calendar. Key details such as event title, start and end times, description, location, and attendees are mapped directly from your KlickTipp data, ensuring every scheduled event is instantly reflected in your calendar without manual entry.

Ideal for marketers, coaches, and businesses running webinars, trainings, or appointments, this automation guarantees that tagged contacts are immediately registered into a properly structured calendar event. With each tag action, you can streamline scheduling, eliminate repetitive admin work, and keep your calendar always up to date.
